lyrics.text:
’E hoku ‘Otua koe
Tupu’anga koe;
Mo hono mo’ui’anga,
‘O e fiefia.

Ko hoku ‘aho ngingila,
Pea lelei lahi;
‘Oku ‘i he ‘Afiona,
Mo ‘eku pō lelei.

Kapau ‘e fakahā koe
‘I he pōpō’uli;
‘E maamangia ai leva.
Hoku laumālie.

Ko hoku fetu’u’aho,
‘A e ‘Afiona.
Pea ko e la’ā ulo,
Ki he laumālie.

‘Oku ulo ‘e he langi
‘O takatakai au;
‘I he ngaahi huelo ni
‘O e fiefia.
